analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/20/0x1e2d6ca17730e657f6ef0446126d5ae2869ee8d9.sol:
	Contract MESSIToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/20/0x1e2d6ca17730e657f6ef0446126d5ae2869ee8d9.sol)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
